original_text: So I bought a loincloth according to the word of the Lord, and put it around my waist.
korean_text: 내가 여호와의 말씀대로 띠를 사서 내 허리에 띠니라

sentences.original_text: So I bought a loincloth according to the word of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 나는 주의 말씀대로 허리띠를 샀다

sentences.original_text: and put it around my waist
